basics.name: Devin Collins
basics.label: Site Reliability Engineer
basics.summary: I am a site reliability engineer with passion for automating processes and delivering a top notch user experience. I use my unique mix of experience ranging from customer-facing support, QA, to software engineer to build tools and processes that help drive the developer experience and improve performance of entire organizations.

highlights: Created a cluster of Android based emulator devices running in Kubernetes that helped with onboarding of new customers by priving a more seamless gameplay experience
Created internal software designed to translate GRPC and HTTP requests into Android Device (ADB) commands
